technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed a little bit of negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past.
communal_orientation: The participant displayed some behaviors and made some statements that reflect a desire for social connectedness with their conversation partner.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversed with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are extremely important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a good amount of cognitive complexity during the conversation.
